summary:
Alternative textures for CBBE.
This textures adds small changes to CBBE textures like breasts, nipples, vagina, ass, back
descriptionHtml:
The original textures are from Caliente body mod, these textures are a modification of the original ones. This textures adds small changes to CBBE textures like breasts, nipples, vagina, ass, back...

I did these modifications to fit my tastes and i thought share them, they change small things trying to give a bit more definition to some places, maybe arent the best textures but they may fill the tastes of some people. 

See the pictures for more details and comparsion
THE CHANGES ARE BEST SEEN IN GAME, REALLY, TRY IT

INSTALLATION

First you need download the original mod by Caliente:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
KEEP IN MIND THE OPTIONAL FILE OF MY DOWNLOADS IS FOR V2 AND THE LAST VERSION FOR V3

Then just replace the textures here included in the correct folder

Warning: the textures are made for the original CBBE, I did not test them in the slim version or others but i suppose they wor.

The textures are ready to fit hands, feet and neck seams with caliente ones compatibles.

If there is problem with seams is prolly cos caliente has to fix it, as the textures has the same seams of Caliente\'s ones in hands, feet and neck, so wait him to fix it.

///CHANGELOG///

1.3

- Tits and nipples retouched to fit better and add detail
- Some ass changes
- Retocuhed back lightings to fit better
- Hip fixed to fit V2 armors (although its impossible to fit completly, u still will see some line but very subtile)
- Neck fixed ready to blend with facemods
- Improved height map for V3 and hip fixes
- New crotch
- Added the genital hairs
- New light pubic hair

1.2

- Textures now are ready for CBBE V3
- Tits and nipples redone
- Back redone
- Crotch adjusted to fit V3
- Several changes in lightings and shadows

1.1

- Modified and combined thepal + caliente normal map
- Bellybutton remade
- Changed back lights and shadows
- Added Bush hair for vagina
- Some other minor changes
author: XdyeXD
